text: 260px Mahmoud Mohammadi (born 1980 in Tehran) is an Iranian wrestler. In 2000 he became the 17th Pahlevan of Iran. He was a wrestling champion at the World and Asian Youth Championship in 1999. ==References== Category:Iranian male sport wrestlers Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Tehran Category:1980 births Category:Pahlevans of Iran
title: Mahmoud Mohammadi
